column3: This also means not storing nIndex anymore. Do we want that?\n
I didnt realize nIndex is a member-variable. But we should pass the index to the function, instead of looping again and searching for it. I'll change it.\n
We currently don't need nIndex either, but it's information I'd like to keep around as it allows us to reconstruct the merkle path as long as the full blocks are available.\n
update:\nI added the code-block with nIndex back in now. I would prefer passing nIndex as parameter, but that can be done another time.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4938_4333cc1c86c6164fd78621fb0d23e7e0eaabff79/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
